title: ECP meets to discuss, implement SCâ€™s verdict
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 18 (APP):A meeting of Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) held here Thursday to discuss the implementation of recent judgment of Supreme Court (SC) regarding reserved seats in the parliament.
Secretary Election Commission, Special Secretary and legal team briefed the ECP, said a press release issued here.
The ECP adjourned the meeting to again meet on Friday for further proceeding, it further said.
